Description.Text: A 21st century grand hotel, perfectly positioned just moments from Trafalgar Square, Westminster and Covent Garden, yet close to Mayfair and The City?s Square Mile, our new flagship provides state-of-the-art facilities in an eminent building dating back to 1885 and the Empire days of Queen Victoria. A supremely elegant facade, 294 sumptuous rooms and suites, stylish bars and speciality restaurants, together with the city?s largest spa and wellness facility. Also, please find listed below the following amenities offered by this hotel: ? Fully flexible check-in /check-out times so your room is ready whenever you choose to arrive or depart (all we?d need from you is the clients? arrival and departure times) ? Complimentary Wifi throughout the hotel ? 24 hour gym access ? 35,000 square foot ESPA Life at Corinthia, including a thermal floor and pool (children?s times apply) ? North American, European and UK voltage sockets in all rooms ? Harrods store in the lobby ? Flower shop on site ? Outside Courtyard seating

The location of our grand hotel in Whitehall Place could not be more prestigious. Literally a few minutes from 10 Downing Street and close to world-class cultural institutions such as the National Gallery and Royal Opera House, London?s lavish and illustrious past is brought right up to modern luxury standards with 21st century comfort and among the most spacious rooms in the capital.

Superior King - 32 sqm Whether you opt for an outlook of bustling cityscape or prefer a peaceful inner courtyard and balcony, these sumptuous rooms offer a stylish living space that combines state-of-the-art modern luxury with traditional five-star comfort. With regal-sized accommodation and a spacious bathroom boasting both a separate grand walk-in shower and tropical rain shower, our Superior King rooms sets new standards in contemporary comfort. Room features include: ? Loewe LED TV ? Nespresso Coffee machine ? Italian marble En-Suite bathroom with under-floor heating ? Refrigerated private bar ? Complimentary newspaper delivered to the door
A supremely elegant facade, 294 sumptuous rooms and suites, stylish destination bars and speciality restaurants, together with the city?s largest spa and wellness facility.

The Northall, Open seven days a week and offering all-day dining options, this sophisticated modern restaurant showcases the best of British cuisine in a world-class setting. Focusing on seasonal produce supplied by artisanal producers from around the British Isles, it offers both informal menus at accessible prices and a private fine dining area for the most exacting of palates. Suitable for all personal and professional occasions. Massimo Restaurant and Oyster Bar, For fine dining with effortless panache, look no further than our Mediterranean seafood restaurant inspired and run by chef patron Massimo Riccioli. Boasting an exquisite a la carte menu created around sustainable sourcing, together with a world-class array of wines and delightful home-made pastas, the effervescent personality of Riccioli himself provides the warmth and vitality of the traditional Mediterranean welcome.

With inspiration from world-class designers, we have created vast lobbies and high ceilings to take full advantage of spectacular cityscape views and have blended them with cutting-edge design to create iconic public spaces flooded with natural light.
